text: The Splendid Coward is a 1918 British silent crime film directed by F. Martin Thornton and starring James Knight, Joan Legge and Roy Travers.Goble p.963 ==Cast== * James Knight as Dick Swinton * Joan Legge as Dora Dundas * Roy Travers as Vivian Ormsby * Winifred Evans as Lady Mary Swinton * Clifford Pembroke as Rev. Swinton * Sydney Lewis Ransome as Trimmer * Jeff Barlow as Earl of Heresford * Thomas Canning as Col. Dundas * Teddy Arundell as Jack Lorimer ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1918 films Category:British films Category:British silent feature films Category:British crime drama films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Floyd Martin Thornton Category:Films set in England Category:British black-and-white films Category:1918 crime drama films Category:1918 drama films
title: The Splendid Coward
